column5: Traditional style decor home with joining bed rooms. Straight shot to entertainment area (cowboy, rangers, sixflags, etc.) within 5 miles. Beautiful lounging area with poolside view of canal. In the center of the DFW metroplex with easy access to I-30 which is within a half hour to downtown Dallas and Ft. Worth. Off street parking available, game room with pool table, patio with grill, hammock by canal.
